# Rokkit Bits UI Documentation for LLMs

> Rokkit Bits UI is a data-driven component library built on top of Bits UI for Svelte.

This site provides documentation in a format optimized for Large Language Models, with each page available as a clean text file.

## Complete Documentation

- [Complete documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/llms.txt): The complete Rokkit Bits UI documentation including all components, utilities, and concepts

## General

- [Introduction Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/introduction/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Introduction
- [Getting Started Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/getting-started/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Getting Started
- [Field Mapping Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/field-mapping/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Field Mapping
- [Data Binding Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/data-binding/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Data Binding
- [Migration Guide Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/migration-guide/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Migration Guide

## Components

- [List Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/list/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for List component
- [ListItem Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/listitem/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for ListItem component
- [Form Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/form/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Form component
- [Field Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/field/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Field component
- [Combobox Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/combobox/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Combobox component
- [Modal Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/modal/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Modal component
- [Table Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/table/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Table component

## Utilities

- [Use Field Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/utilities/use-field/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Use Field utility
- [Create Emitter Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/utilities/create-emitter/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Create Emitter utility
- [Data Controller Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/utilities/data-controller/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Data Controller utility

## Type Helpers

- [Field Mapping Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/type-helpers/field-mapping/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Field Mapping type helper
- [Data Item Documentation](https://rokkit.bits-ui.com/docs/type-helpers/data-item/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Data Item type helper
